author: @BrandonJacobson
text: I don't know if you still see these comments on old videos.  I plotted the S&P 500 over the Russell 2000 on the Y-axis and time on the X-axis of course.  Is there a way to change the Y-axis while the program is active?  What if I want to plot the S&P 500 over the treasury yield curve?  Can matplotlib do that or would I have to use Tkinter and then open and close matplotlib graphs?
